titleStmt.title: An exposition touching al the bokes of holie Scripture, and their excellencie

publicationStmt.publisher: In ædibus Richardi Graftoni Reginæ a typographia excusum,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: The dignitie of the Scripture.
Identified as STC 3033a on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
